names.english: clear dampness and dislodge phlegm formula
names.commonEnglish: Clear Dampness and Dislodge Phlegm Formula

actions: Strongly dries Dampness, tonifies the Spleen and clears Dampness from the Lower Jiao.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness, promotes water metabolism and calms the fetus.
Clears and transforms Phlegm-Heat.
With Jiang Ban Xia, for coughing, difficult-to-expectorate sputum and chest pain due to Phlegm-Heat.
With Dan Nan Xing, for Phlegm-Heat Blocking the Lungs.
Dries Dampness, transforms Phlegm, descends Qi and alleviates nausea for either Phlegm and thin mucus from Spleen Deficiency or Cold-Phlegm causing coughing and rebellious Qi.
Unblocks the collaterals and transforms Phlegm for Phlegm congestion and cough with chest and rib pain.
Stops bleeding by astringing, invigorates the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
Invigorates Blood circulation, dispels Blood Stasis, regulates Qi and alleviates pain.
Opens the Orifices, vaporizes Phlegm, transforms turbid Dampness, harmonizes the Middle Jiao, awakens the Spleen and promotes the movement of Qi.
Clears Heat and dissolves Phlegm.
Promotes the movement of Qi and reduces distention and pressure.
Clears Heat, transforms Hot Phlegm and calms the fetus.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
With Bai Zhu, strengthens the Spleen and resolves Dampness.
With Jiang Ban Xia, for Phlegm, thin mucus and turbid Dampness.
Eliminates Dampness
Eliminates Qi Stagnation
Invigorates the Blood
Dissipates Phlegm
Removes obstructions from the Ren and Chong vessels
Nourishes the Chong meridian and reproductive organs
Regulates menstruation
syndromes: Phlegm-Damp Stagnation in the Lower Jiao

symptoms: A long history of Excess Phlegm
Delayed menstrual cycle with sticky discharge or
Possible swelling and edema of the lower limbs
A feeling of stuffiness in the chest
manifestations.pulse: Slippery or Wiry and slippery or Slippery, soft and thready or Thready and retarded

modifications.purpose: shortness of breath and excessive vaginal discharge
